casebody.data:
Cain, Admr., Appellee, v. Simpson, Admr., et al.; City of Niles et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Cain v. Simpson (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 202.]

(Nos. 00-584 and 00-808 Submitted February 28, 2001 Decided March 28, 2001.) Reminger & Reminger Co., L.P.A., and Nick C. Tomino, for appellants.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Stevens v. Ackman (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 182, 743 N.E.2d 901.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
